brief: Set multiple playback parameters of the soundfile at once.
name: set()
description: Set multiple playback parameters of the soundfile at once.

parameters.name: rate
parameters.description: relative playback rate to use. 1 is the original speed. 0.5 is half speed and one octave down. 2 is double the speed and one octave up.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: the panoramic position of this sound unit from -1.0 (left) to 1.0 (right).

parameters.name: amp
parameters.description: the desired playback amplitude of the audiosample as a value from 0.0 (complete silence) to 1.0 (full volume)

parameters.name: add
parameters.description: offset the output of the generator by the given value
